price: 110. Loba: Bobelela Allah to bobelela Ar-Rahmân(1) to nkombo nini bolingi kobenga, ye nde azali na ba nkombo ya kitoko. Mpe koganga te okati ya losambo nayo koleka, kovanda mpe nye te, kasi zala na mongongo ya kati kati.
arabic: قُلِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱللَّهَ أَوِ ٱدۡعُواْ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَۖ أَيّٗا مَّا تَدۡعُواْ فَلَهُ ٱلۡأَسۡمَآءُ ٱلۡحُسۡنَىٰۚ وَلَا تَجۡهَرۡ بِصَلَاتِكَ وَلَا تُخَافِتۡ بِهَا وَٱبۡتَغِ بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: 1 Ar-Rahmân: Ezali moko ya kombo ya Allah, elakisi: Oyo atonda ngolu.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: quli id'ʿū al-laha awi id'ʿū al-raḥmāna ayyan mā tadʿū falahu al-asmāu al-ḥus'nā walā tajhar biṣalātika walā tukhāfit bihā wa-ib'taghi bayna dhālika sabīlan
